meanings.definition: a unit used to measure the speed of data transmission
meanings.sent1: The baud on my computer determines how fast I can send information.
meanings.sent2: The technician explained that the baud rate affects the speed of data transfer.
meanings.sent3: I tried to count the bauds flying through the internet cables, but they were too quick!
meanings.sent4: The baud was like a heartbeat, pulsing with the rhythm of digital communication.
meanings.sent5: The baud raced through the wires like a speedy messenger, delivering my messages instantly.

meanings.definition: the number of signal changes per second in a data transmission signal
meanings.sent1: The baud of the modem indicates how many signal changes occur in a second.
meanings.sent2: The higher the baud, the more information can be transmitted in a shorter time.
meanings.sent3: The baud danced up and down, changing signals like a digital conductor.
meanings.sent4: In the world of data, the baud is the heartbeat that keeps the information flowing.
meanings.sent5: Each baud was like a flickering light, signaling the rapid exchange of data.
